short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lightweight and easy to use page measurement tool. Supports mouse and keyboard input.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension renders on the active tab page a rectangle which shows its dimensions and can be used to measure size of any page element. The rectangle can be resized or moved via mouse or keyboard. This is a helpful tool for web developers.
